actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds for a demonstration peat-fueled electrical generating plant located in North Carolina.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of funds to the Department of Energy for a demonstration peat-fueled electrical generating plant in North Carolina to be operated by the North Carolina Electric Membership Corporation. Stipulates that such corporation will provide approximately one-half of the cost of such plant.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds for a demonstration peat-fueled electrical generating plant located in North Carolina.
